name: Onam Sadhya - A taste of Kerala
description: Chef Mako, a half Malayali, and Akash Murali, a Kerala-born chef , are coming together to curate a unique Onam Sadhya experience at Love Ooru, Koramangala. This collaboration promises a festive feast that showcasing a rich array of traditional dishes prepared with fresh, local ingredients. Join them for an unforgettable culinary journey that honors the spirit of Kerala’s most cherished festival.This curated community-style vegetarian lunch will include a 29-dish spread including Kadachakka Kuzhachatu (Breadfruit Stir Fry), Parippu Curry, Mathanga Elisseri (Yellow Pumpkin & peas curry ), Pavaka Theeyal (Spicy Bitter-gourd & tamarind gravy) Pineapple Kichadi, Avial, Red Rice & 2 payasams - Ada Pradhaman & Paal Payasam served on a banana leaf.*Takeaway option available between 12-4pm for minimum 2 person.What's an Onam Sadhya?Sadhya is not just about the food but also about community and togetherness. Families and friends come together to prepare and enjoy the meal, reflecting the spirit of unity and prosperity that the festival embodies. Onam Sadhya is a traditional vegetarian feast from Kerala, India, served during the festival of Onam, which celebrates the harvest season and the return of the mythical King Mahabali. The word "Sadhya" means banquet or feast in Malayalam, and this meal is a significant aspect of Onam celebrations.Venue: Love OORU﻿Rooftop / Sunsets / Wine & Grills https://www.instagram.com/love.ooru/?hl=enChef Mako : https://www.instagram.com/chef_mako?igsh=dndubmd6N21wOXBxAkash Murali : https://www.instagram.com/akashfooddoc?igsh=MWtrOXZ6c3JsZWRpbg==

location.name: love OORU
location.address: No. 136, Evergreen PARC, Rooftop, 1st Cross Road, 5th Block,, Koramangala, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: love OORU
organizer.description: love.OORU is a tranquil oasis on the rooftop which is the perfect setting for enjoying beautiful sunsets, hosting private dinners & events, and maybe indulging in a chef's table experience.  Taking inspiration from Bengaluru, her history, geography, culture, and most importantly her stories, love.OORU was born as an identity rooted in Bengaluru and all it has to offer.

name: Sip & Read
description: Come, join us for a Sunday where time slows, and the only sound is the gentle hum of turning pages. Sip & Read is back, this time at the cozy HeyBrewty studio, where earthy tones and a soft sun glow welcome us all. 🤗We’ll spend an hour immersed in our books, sipping on tea brews, followed by light-hearted chats that stir up fond reading memories—all with gentle acoustics playing in the background.Bring whatever you love to read—be it a paperback, Kindle, magazine, or newspaper—or explore something new from our library! Consider it a mini getaway from your usual weekend errands, with phones also taking a much-needed rest.Plus, there’ll be fun giveaways for you to take home! ✨📚 Get cozy with a good book alongside fellow readers💬 Jump into lively convos🍷 Enjoy a complimentary tea with a light bite📍 At HeyBrewty Wellness Studio, Ashok NagarBonus: Free Bookmark Premium membership and mementos for keepsakes!

location.address: Hotel Ajantha, 22/A, Craig Park Layout, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

organizer.name: Bookmark App
organizer.description: Bookmark is a dating app for readers. It connects people based on not just what books they like, but also other attributes and interests about their personality, distance, the relationship they are seeking, gender preferences, and more. Download and try it today!

name: Gravy and Pie Shop with Chef Aarohi Sanghavi from MÄKI Patisserie
description: Gravy and Pie Shop at The ConservatoryOur glasshouse transforms into a Gravy & Pie shop for the weekend, serving up brasserie-style food, all doused in rich gravies and sauces.Chef Aarohi Sanghavi from Mäki has drawn inspiration from pies served around the world, applying Mäki’s unique adaptations. Hearty, warm, and comforting—these are the emotions we're aiming to evoke.Expect flaky, buttery, crumbly crusts encasing a flavorful interior, served with sauces that complement every bite.Pie shop MenuSavoury PiesPigs in a blanket with Grape Mostarda - ₹680B**f Bourgignon Shepherds Pie - But not like you’re used to - ₹680Chicken and Black Garlic Pithivier - ₹620GaletteFresh goats cheese, roasted beets and nigella (NV) - ₹500Sausage, pecorino and baked quail egg - ₹530Zucchini and Caper Filo Pie with Pistachio Pesto - ₹530Smoked Aubergine, mushroom, and tomato Bake with Cheddar and Sesame crust - ₹560Sweet PiesCold Chocolate Banana Cream Pie - ₹480Warm Apple Crumble Tart with crème anglaise - ₹470Hojicha Tart Tropezienne with Plum sauce - ₹428Cream Cheese and Pink Guava Pastelitos - ₹470Terms and Conditions: The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an event.Conservatory is located on the 2nd floor of courtyard which is a 44 steps climb upDo not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.Each slot, lasting 2 hours only, requires attendance at the booked time, with no accommodation for attendance at any other slot except the one booked.No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.Children over 7 years of age require a ticket.Children below the age of 7 are not allowed.No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.Please note that both vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes are prepared in the same kitchen.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval of theirs.

name: 'Monsters, Inc.' (2001) Movie Screening | Family Movie Night
description: Family Movie Night at The Studio, Courtyard, ShantinagarJoin us as we watch a series of carefully curated rare masterpieces from around the world, made just for kids. Watch this film while cozying up with your family!Given the nature of the film, we recommend it for children aged 7 and older.About the movie:"Monsters, Inc." is a 2001 animated film by Pixar Animation Studios. Set in the city of Monstropolis, the film explores a world where monsters generate power for their city by scaring children. The story follows two main characters: Sulley, a large, gentle blue monster with purple spots, and his best friend Mike Wazowski, a small, green, one-eyed monster.Why Attend?Broaden Horizons with Global Tales: Dive into diverse artistic expressions through rare masterpieces curated for children.Quality Family Bonding: Embark on a cinematic journey to a new country each month, forging lasting memories and strengthening family connections.Uncover Hidden Treasures: Discover lesser-known gems handpicked for their artistic brilliance and captivating storytelling.Artistic Excellence: Immerse your child in films of unparalleled artistic merit, fueling their imagination and creativity.Safe Family Environment: Enjoy movies in a secure, family-friendly setting, ensuring a worry-free experience for kids and parents alike.Don't miss this opportunity to create lasting memories with your family while exposing your kids to the wonders of world cinema.Join us for Family Movie Night – where the magic of storytelling knows no bounds!Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.The Event is taking place at Courtyard's indoor Studio space on the second floor.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Children above the age of 3 need a ticket to attend the event.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain or other unforeseen conditions, the event will be moved indoors.

name: Janapada Kala Darshana
description: "Janapada Kala Darshana" is a vibrant and cultural event that celebrates the essence of rural life, traditions and cuisine of Karnataka. Explore the rich heritage and history of the region with a guided museum tour at Jana Pada loka, showcasing artifacts and exhibits that highlight the cultural significance of the area.Enjoy sumptuous traditional meals at Kamat Lokaruchi, featuring an array of authentic local dishes that are served in a picturesque traditional village setup, offering a taste of rural life.Visit to chennapatna toy workshop run by Shilpa Trust, where artisans craft exquisite traditional toys, offering insights into the age-old art of toy making. Immerse yourself in the cultural heritage of the region with captivating performances like Dollu Kunitha, a dynamic and rhythmic drum dance."Janapada Kala Darshana" promises a delightful blend of cultural immersion, culinary delights, and interactive experiences that showcase the beauty of rural life and traditions.Special Offer: Enjoy a delightful 20% discount by using the coupon code "GVM20" at checkout. Valid until midnight tonight.

location.address: Doddamannugudde Forest, Karnataka 562159, India

organizer.name: JANAPADA KALA DARSHANA

name: Enjoy Wine Cocktails & Conversations with Strangers
description: Looking to sip on delicious wine cocktails & savor mouthwatering appetizers while meeting awesome new people? Join us for an evening of laughter, great conversations & new friendships! Whether you're a wine enthusiast or just love good company, this table is perfect for you.  It's all about fun, food, and fantastic vibes. So, bring your smile, your love for good times, and get ready to make some unforgettable memories with strangers who might just become your new best friends! Cheers!

organizer.name: TwoTablesClub
organizer.description: Where a small group of strangers come together for genuine conversations & spontaneous connections  over a curated meal. Guided by a host every Table is a mix of locals & newcomers sharing stories of their roots & dreams

name: Friday Workday Deli Counter
description: Friday Deli CounterWant to spend a day in the heart of Indiranagar, on a work-day,  getting loads done and enjoying the beautiful tree-top view? Come spend a working day with us at the co-working space at Studio by Copper + Cloves. Our members find that they are more productive than usual at the Studio! This Friday we are opening out the space beyond our members, for an open-day with a delicious, nourishing 'fill-your-plate' spread !Nourish yourself at our ‘all you can eat’ deli counter and work from our beautiful cafe/co-working space at the Studio that is normally a members-only space!

organizer.name: Copper + Cloves

name: Popular Tea Cakes Workshop
description: Popular Tea Cakes Workshops We cover a variety of  of 5 various tea cakes that we teach from scratch. We use only the best of ingredients and source everything locally. We teach you how to bake cakes and the frostings that go with it, in a tradiotional method. Its a hands on experince and we provide the students with hand outs which they will be taking home with them.-Banana Cake with Dark Chocolate Chips-Sticky Toffee Date Cake with Salted Caramel Sauce -Carrot Cake with Cream Cheese Frosting -Orange Pound Cake Looking forward to baking the world a better place!

name: Eggless Cake Making Workshop
description: Weclome to our Eggless Cake Making Workshop!We teach you to bake your cakes to perfection with giving you a product thats so flavourful, you don't feel the absence of egg at all.What will you learn?-Eggless Vanilla Sponge -Eggless Chocolate Sponge -Couverture Chocolate Ganache -Salted Caramel -Whipping of Organic fresh cream (sourced from France) -Flavour Pairings (Caramel Chocolate Cake, Black Forest Cake, Classic Chocolate Cake , Fresh Cream Fruit Cake ).We make sure you embrace the art of baking and use the skills you will learn to best use.

name: Screening: Silver Linings Playbook (2012) | Movie Under the Stars
description: Join us for an open-air screening of Silver Linings Playbook (2012), with a three-course dinner and popcorn.*Wines and other beverages will be available for purchase at the venue.About the movieSilver Linings Playbook (2012), directed by David O. Russell, is a romantic comedy-drama based on the novel by Matthew Quick.?Pat Solitano (Bradley Cooper) is a former teacher who has just been released from a mental health facility after a period of treatment for bipolar disorder. He returns to live with his parents, Pat Sr. (Robert De Niro) and Dolores (Jacki Weaver), and is determined to rebuild his life and reconcile with his estranged wife.The film was praised for its performances, particularly those of Jennifer Lawrence, who won an Academy Award for Best Actress, and its sensitive portrayal of mental health issues.3-Course Menu- To be announcedTerms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. name: Cupcake Workshop
description: This Cupcake workshop is a great introduction to the world of baking! The little cakes have techniques and tricks to the process which we gladly would share to better your baking experince. We cover a variety of topics during this class.The list goes as follows-Vanilla Cupcake Chocolate Cupcake Red Velvet Cupcake Chocolate Chip Muffin Vanilla Buttercream Frosting Chocolate Frosting Cream Cheese Frosting A hands on, interactive and informative session that you will Love!

name: Onam Sadya at Coracle Café
description: It's our favourite time of the year! Onam! The best part of our favourite Malayali holiday is of course, the food! It's Sadhya time! Our special sadhya made traditionally and served authentically on a banana leaf. An unforgettable experience for some and an indulgence for many, our sashay promises to be top of the notch and delicious. Here's what our traditional vegetarian Sadhya includes:Salt Mango Pickle Banana Chips Sharkaravaratti Banana GheePapadam Puli InjiMezhukkupuratti - Dry VegAvialOlanErisherry Pineapple Pachadi Vellarikka Pachadi - Yoghurt Thoran Parippu - Dal Sambar RasamMoru Kaalan - (yoghurt)Red Rice/ White Rice PradhamanPal PayasamDon't worry our meat eating patrons! If you choose the Non Vegetarian Sadhya you will get everything in the vegetarian sadhya plus some non veg touchings like Fish fry, Beef ullarthu, prawn fry and Chicken fry!

location.address: 7, 4th Main Rd, Stage 2, Domlur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560071, India

organizer.name: Coracle Café
organizer.description: Restaurant nestled in BIC

name: Onam Sadya
description: To celebrate the festival of Onam, we bring to you as our next pop up an authentic Onam Sadya. Enjoy the taste of Kerala with our Onam Sadya, featuring 25 traditional dishes served on a banana leaf. For a modern twist, we also offer a few select non-vegetarian options to complement the feast, creating a perfect blend of tradition and flavour.Here is a glimpse of the menu:1.⁠ ⁠Sambaram - Spiced buttermilk.2.⁠ ⁠Uppu - Salt.3.Naalu Keeri Upperi - Banana chips cut into four triangles.4.⁠ ⁠Sarkara Varatti - Jaggery-coated banana chips.5.⁠ ⁠Inji Puli - Ginger-tamarind chutney.6.⁠ ⁠Naaraanga Achar - Lemon pickle.7.⁠ ⁠Maanga Achar- Mango pickle.8.⁠ ⁠Beetroot Pachadi - Yogurt-based beetroot dish.9.⁠ ⁠Pineapple Pachadi - Yogurt-based pineapple dish.10.⁠ ⁠Cabbage Thoran - Cabbage with coconut.11.⁠ ⁠Aviyal - Mixed vegetable curry.12.⁠ ⁠Olan - Ash gourd and cowpeas in coconut milk.13.⁠ ⁠Mathanga Erissery - Pumpkin and coconut curry.14.⁠ ⁠Koottu Curry - Mixed vegetable and lentil curry.15.⁠ ⁠Kuthari / Ponni Ari - Red rice/White rice.16. Katti parippu - Simple cooked dal with ghee.17.⁠ ⁠Sambar 18.⁠ ⁠Moru Curry - Spiced curd curry.19.⁠ ⁠Rasam 20.⁠ ⁠Pappadam 21.⁠ ⁠Meen Porichath - Spicy fried fish.22.⁠ ⁠Kozhi Roast - Dry, spicy chicken roast.23.⁠ ⁠Koonthal Roast - Spicy squid roast.24.⁠ ⁠Chemeen Chammanthi - Shrimp and coconut chutney.25.⁠ ⁠Boli and Paalada Pradhaman PayasamTerms & Conditions:Please arrive punctually.Late arrivals may miss the first few courses.Booking Fee are non-refundable under all circumstances once booked. Tickets are transferrable to a third party.No shows/ cancellations will not be refunded, but you can reschedule your booking for within the week 48hrs before your slot is due.Alcohol will not be served to guests under the age of 21No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.The booking fee total includes the online transaction fee.Parking at the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet is available.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. Incase you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

location.address: 1, Palace Rd, Ambedkar Veedhi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

name: Sunset Voice Activation + Healing Session
description: Join us to explore the true power of your voice. Our voices have so much more potential than just communicating. Our voices can be powerful tools for calming our mind and body, manifesting our dreams, and even healing our past wounds. By tapping into your true voice, you have the ability to shift your reality and also effortlessly enter a meditative flow state whenever you need.What to expect from the workshop:Discover how your voice can calm your mind, manifest goals, and heal past experiences.Explore how sound resonates within your body.Practice gentle exercises to activate your vagus nerve.Work on unlocking your throat chakra.Learn about the impact of different sound frequencies in daily life.Experience a deep relaxation through a soothing, sung frequency healing session.After the session we will enjoy a soothing herbal tea and cacao bliss balls

location.name: Copper + Cloves
location.address: 4th Floor, 167, 2nd Stage, 2nd Cross, Shankarnag Rd, Stage 2, Domlur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560071, India

organizer.name: Copper + Cloves
organizer.description: We are all about nourishing food and creating spaces for connection!

name: Conscious Connected Breathwork by Ram
description: Join us for a session of Conscious Breathwork, where we'll explore the powerful connection between our breath and our true essence. As Ram reminds us through the words in the image: “We are all already perfect at our core. There is nothing that needs to be fixed or changed"  we’ll reconnect with the perfection that already exists within each of us.What to expect from the workshop -Practice techniques that bring awareness to how we disconnect from our core selves.Use mindful breathing to release traumas, memories, and subtle energies that hold us back.Deepen your connection to your true essence.Experience the love, peace, joy, and bliss that are always within you.Cacao ceremony.

location.name: Copper + Cloves

name: The Courtyard Picnic with SUBKO Coffee | September 2024
description: About September PicnicWith SUBKO now setting up shop at Courtyard, we're thrilled to team up with them for this month’s Courtyard Picnic—our first collaboration!Join us under the canopy of our lush city oasis for a sun-soaked (fingers crossed!) afternoon filled with board games, wine, coffee, and SUBKO’s irresistible picnic plates.On the menuSignature bites from SUBKO’s lineup, including Subko Croissant, Harissa Grilled Cheese, The Hipster Toast, Bacon & Caramelized Onion, Mushroom Pepperfry Quiche, Notella Toast, Rustic Apple Tart, and the indulgent Kashmiri Walnut Sea Salt Cookie.We’ll also have a curated selection of wines from Wine in Progress to sip on as you lounge in the yard._________And don’t forget—your furry friends are welcome to join the fun too!See you at the yard for a perfect day out with great food, great coffee, and even better company. Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Children above the age of 3 need a ticket to attend the event.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain or other unforeseen conditions, the event will be moved indoors.

name: classic pilates & sound healing
description: Come join us for day filled with activities , healing and nourishing food ! We start our day with a healthy breakfast and move onto a session of pilates followed by a scrumptious vegan meal by Just be . Post lunch we have a beautiful healing session of sound healing , followed by snacks to end the day.

organizer.name: KSARAAH
organizer.description: we are an organic farm hosting a variety of activities over the weekend

name: Nourish & Balance: Cacao & Yoga for Hormonal balance
description: Join us for a special women's event dedicated to nurturing your body and mind through the healing power of cacao, yoga, and self-care. This session is designed to help you find balance, both hormonally and emotionally.What to Expect:Cacao Meditation & Breathwork:Begin with a guided cacao meditation, focusing on its calming effects.Participate in a discussion about personal experiences with cacao.Learn about the hormonal benefits of cacao.Enjoy a simple breathwork practice to help regulate the nervous system.Hormonal Balance Yoga:Engage in a relaxing yoga session tailored for hormonal balance.End with a soothing self-massage to promote relaxation.Savor a cup of cacao-infused tea afterward.Cacao Deli Spread:Delight in a selection of nourishing treats including:Cacao Nibs SaladFunctional Mushrooms on Sourdough (featuring lion’s mane)Cacao Brownies and Energy BallsThis event is a beautiful opportunity to connect with yourself and other women while indulging in practices that support your hormonal health. We look forward to sharing this nurturing experience with you.
